label: Leadership
heading: Academic Leadership
description: Meet our distinguished academic leader driving excellence and innovation in Agriculture education.

profile.name: Dr. Subodh Pande
profile.title: Dean of Agriculture
bio: With 37 years of experience, Dr. Subodh Pande emphasizes practical, hands-on learning to prepare students for real-world careers. The department supports growth through farm units, student clubs, and strong industry partnerships. Students are encouraged to explore, innovate, and apply their knowledge. Under his guidance, the focus remains on nurturing skilled, confident agricultural professionals who can make a meaningful impact on the community and environment.
